section_2.h2: A new way to explore the world
section_2.text: For decades travellers have reached for Lonely Planet books when looking to plan and execute their perfect trip, but now, they can also let Lonely Planet Experiences lead the way

section_4.text: Packed with tips and advice from our on-the-ground experts, our city guides app (iOS and Android) is the ultimate resource before and during a trip.
